content.title: Add Label to Template
content.body:
1. Navigate to the Default Library tab on the bottom left of your Iris.
  2. Next to the Default Library, you will see the My Libraries tab and a search icon . Click the search icon.
  3. In the search bar that appears, enter Label.
  4. From the results, under Default, select Label.
  5. Drag the Label widget onto flxSeg on the canvas.
  6. From the Project explorer, right-click on the new label and select Rename.
  7. Rename the label employeeName.
